text: I decided to upgrade my PC so I was busy with that during the past couple days. I just finally transfered all my files and re-installed most of the apps I need, and why not start testing things by making a new upload! 2018 is the year of the Metroidvanias, so many of them came out and most are very solid. I can never have too many of them so I'm glad. SOTN still feels like the king of the genre (which to me is different than Metroid-likes), even if Hollow Knight is now my favorite one. Yamane's soundtrack is still one of the best ever and that certainly won't change.
author: SupraDarky
